title: Split Zone No.13 - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Alternate World   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Mystery Solving   Schizophrenia   Souls   Special Abilities

description: When Li Shen’s second personality acts out, her consciousness is sent to a strange place called Split Zone No.13. She is then informed that she can only return home after unraveling the truth.>
